description: Manage routes of route table in the virtual hub.

commands.name: az network vhub route-table route add
commands.summary: Add a route into route table of the virtual hub.
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-table route add --destination-type {CIDR, ResourceId, Service}
                                      --destinations
                                      --name
                                      --next-hop-type {ResourceId}
                                      --resource-group
                                      --vhub-name
                                      [--next-hop]
                                      [--no-wait]
                                      [--route-name]
examples: az network vhub route-table route add -n MyRouteTable -g MyResourceGroup --vhub-name MyVhub --destination-type CIDR --destinations "10.4.0.0/16" "10.6.0.0/16" --next-hop-type ResourceId --next-hop /subscriptions/MySub/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Network/azureFirewalls/MyFirewall

commands.name: az network vhub route-table route list
commands.summary: List routes in the virtual hub route table.
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-table route list --name
                                       --resource-group
                                       --vhub-name

commands.name: az network vhub route-table route remove
commands.summary: Remove a route from route table of the virtual hub.
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-table route remove --index
                                         --name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --vhub-name
                                         [--no-wait]
